summary: Mod requested in the forums. Ghosu did most of the work, I just put it in the game. Updates will come later.
descriptionHtml:
This is Ghosu's Zahkrii sword mod for Skyrim, I have used his meshes, textures, and .esp
with his permission to finish the project he was working on. That being said this is not
the final version of the mod. There will be a series of updates to add in some features,
that as of yet have not been implemented. As such here is a list that will be added to
the mod over time.

1) Adding a visual effect to the sword after use of a Thu'um.
2) Adding a small side quest for the sword, or large quest depending on popularity.
3) Again depending on popularity, adding lore books to further describe how the sword(s)
came about.
4) Possibly adding a custom Zahkrii armour to add to the lore of the mod.

Most of these updates I would like to do if the popularity of the mod is large enough,
although not completely necessary.

On that note I would personally like to thank Ghosu on his work, and wish him the best of luck
with his personal road blocks and I urge you all to do the same! This is 100% his work and I
take no credit for the simple implication into our beloved game.

Credits:

Ghosu; Model and textures.
author: Hotemochick1992
